titleStmt.title: The observator's observations upon the bill of exculsion Let every one mend one, and begin the reformation at home. Do as you would be done by, is no text for excluders.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: reprinted by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham; and re to be sold by William Weston in Christ-Church-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.

person.persName: Samuel Helsham; and re to be
